Description.Name: Malik Haddad
Description.Details: Malik Haddad, known as "Zephyr", is a wealthy and cunning MechWarrior with a background as a merchant and rogue trader. With an enigmatic persona, he navigates the battlefield and the world of commerce with equal mastery, always seeking profitable opportunities. His allegiances lie with the highest bidder, making him a formidable force in both trade negotiations and combative engagements.
